Sinopsis 'Doctor Sleep', Mimpi Buruk yang Berlanjut
06 Nov 2019, 20:14 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


'Doctor Sleep', sekuel film horor legendaris 'The Shining', akhirnya tayang ke layar lebar pada Rabu (6/11). Berikut sinopsisnya.: (dok. Warner Bros Pictures)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- 'Doctor Sleep', sekuel film horor legendaris 'The Shining', akhirnya tayang ke layar lebar pada Rabu (6/11). Berikut sinopsisnya.Film ini menceritakan kondisi Danny Torrance setelah lebih dari 39 tahun berhasil keluar dari Hotel Overlook yang mengancam nyawa pada 1980.Film yang diadaptasi dari novel Stephen King ini menunjukkan upaya Danny menyembuhkan trauma akibat segala teror yang dialami sejak tinggal di Hotel Overlook bersama orang tuanya, Jack dan Wendy Torrance. Ia berusaha menghilangkan jati diri sebagai The Shining dengan bekerja sebagai staf di salah satu rumah sakit.Kala itu, Danny merasa musuh terbesar saat ini adalah dirinya sendiri. Ia tak menyadari bahwa True Knot, musuh baru, telah hadir dan mengancam nyawa para The Shining, termasuk dirinya. True Knot merupakan sebuah kelompok yang memangsa The Shining. Mereka 'mengambil alih' kekuatan The Shining untuk bertahan hidup.Hingga pada suatu hari, Abra, 'sahabat pena' Danny, muncul dan memberi tahu kondisi tersebut dan meminta bantuan Danny. Namun, Danny meminta Abra bersembunyi dan tak menggunakan kemampuan agar terhindar dari True Knot.


'Doctor Sleep', sekuel film horor legendaris 'The Shining', akhirnya tayang ke layar lebar pada Rabu (6/11). (dok. Warner Bros Pictures)

Kondisi tak terjadi seperti yang diharapkan. Danny akhirnya memilih membantu Abra. Hal itu membuat dirinya harus kembali menghadapi mimpi buruk serta trauma yang telah lama dikubur, Hotel Overlook. Meski sama-sama berangkat dari novel Stephen King, Doctor Sleep berbeda dari pendahulunya. Film yang digarap Mike Flanagan ini bergenre fantasy thriller. Sementara itu, Stanley Kubrik membuat The Shining menjadi film bergenre psychological horror thriller. Sebelumnya, Mike Flanagan telah dikenal melalui sederet film horor thriller seperti Absentia, Oculus, Hush, Ouija: Origin of Evil, dan Gerald's Game. Ia juga sutradara dari serial horor The Haunting of Hill House. Sehingga, Doctor Sleep menambah deretan karya thriller sutradara berusia 41 tahun tersebut. Film berdurasi 2 jam 31 menit ini dibintangi Ewan McGregor, Kyliegh Curran, Rebecca Ferguson, dan Cliff Curtis. Usai mengetahui sinopsis, Doctor Sleep sudah bisa disaksikan di seluruh jaringan bioskop Indonesia pada Rabu (6/11).

Synopsis of 'Doctor Sleep', the Nightmare that Continues
Nov 6 2019, 20:14 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


'Doctor Sleep', the sequel to the legendary horror film 'The Shining', finally aired on the big screen on Wednesday (6/11). Here is the synopsis: (doc. Warner Bros Pictures)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - 'Doctor Sleep', the sequel to the legendary horror film 'The Shining', finally aired on the big screen on Wednesday (6/11). The following synopsis. This film tells the condition of Danny Torrance after more than 39 years of successfully leaving the Overlook Hotel which was life threatening in 1980. The film adapted from Stephen King's novel shows Danny's efforts to heal the trauma caused by all the terror experienced since living in the Overlook Hotel with people his parents, Jack and Wendy Torrance. He tried to lose his identity as The Shining by working as a staff in one of the hospitals. At that time, Danny felt the biggest enemy at this time was himself. He did not realize that True Knot, a new enemy, was present and threatened the lives of The Shining, including himself. True Knot is a group that preys on The Shining. They 'took over' the power of the Shining to survive. Until one day, Abra, Danny's 'pen pal', appeared and told him the condition and asked for Danny's help. However, Danny asks Abra to hide and not use the ability to avoid True Knot.


'Doctor Sleep', the sequel to the legendary horror film 'The Shining', finally aired on the big screen on Wednesday (6/11). (doc. Warner Bros Pictures)

Conditions did not occur as expected. Danny finally chose to help Abra. That made him have to face the nightmare and trauma that had long been buried, Overlook Hotel. Although both depart from the novel Stephen King, Doctor Sleep is different from its predecessor. The film worked on by Mike Flanagan is a fantasy thriller genre. Meanwhile, Stanley Kubrik made The Shining a psychological horror thriller genre film. Previously, Mike Flanagan was known through a series of thriller horror films such as Absentia, Oculus, Hush, Ouija: Origin of Evil, and Gerald's Game. He is also the director of the horror series The Haunting of Hill House. Thus, Doctor Sleep added to the 41-year-old director's thriller. The 2 hour 31 minute film stars Ewan McGregor, Kyliegh Curran, Rebecca Ferguson and Cliff Curtis. After knowing the synopsis, Doctor Sleep can be witnessed throughout the Indonesian cinema network on Wednesday (6/11).
